title: Emerald and Diamond Kangan - "Pachala Vaira Gajulu"
materials: Cubic Zirconia. Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: These exquisite bangles feature a symmetrical design with alternating rows of sparkling cubic zirconia. The focal point is the vibrant, square-cut emeralds bezel-set in gold, providing a striking contrast. The lattice-like structure provides durability and an airy feel. Each element is carefully handcrafted, showcasing excellent precision.
occasions: and any event where you want to showcase sophisticated elegance. These bangles are also suitable for modern party wear
bringing a touch of tradition to contemporary outfits.
description: These bangles seamlessly blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality emeralds and sparkling cubic zirconia create a luxurious look, while the durable construction ensures they will be treasured for years to come. The bright Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's natural beauty, making these bangles a true statement piece.
